tool_description: Fetches and compares domain registration and renewal pricing across multiple registrars for cost optimization.

registrars.description: Specific registrars to query for pricing

currency.description: Preferred currency for pricing (USD, EUR, GBP)

registration_years.description: Number of years for registration pricing

error_messages: Invalid domain list: Provide 1-10 valid domain names.
Unsupported registrar: One or more registrars are not in the supported list.
Invalid currency: Use supported currency codes (USD, EUR, GBP).
Invalid registration years: Must be between 1 and 10 years.
Pricing API unavailable: Unable to fetch current pricing from registrar APIs.
usage: Provide domain_names to compare pricing across registrars. Customize registrars list, currency, and registration_years for specific pricing needs.

pricing_comparison.description: Detailed pricing breakdown by domain and registrar

lowest_prices.description: Best pricing options for each domain

currency_used.description: Currency used for all pricing information

last_updated.description: When pricing information was last fetched
